SQLCommands.sql: --总账查询 SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {OrderBy}) as row,T.ID,BankID,BankName,DealerID,DealerName,BrandID,BrandName ,CarAllCount=( SELECT count(1) FROM tb_Car_List cl where cl.DraftNo in (SELECT DraftNo FROM tb_Draft_List dl where dl.DealerID=T.DealerID and dl.BankID=T.BankID) and cl.BrandID=T.BrandID and (SELECT cs.StatusType FROM tb_Car_Status cs where cs.Vin=cl.Vin) <> 6 --6表示状态为“出库处理” ) --车辆库存台数（状态为“非出库”） ,CarAllMoney=( ISNULL( (SELECT SUM(CONVERT(MONEY,cl.CarCost)) FROM tb_Car_List cl where cl.DraftNo in (SELECT DraftNo FROM tb_Draft_List dl where dl.DealerID=T.DealerID and dl.BankID=T.BankID) and cl.BrandID=T.BrandID and (SELECT cs.StatusType FROM tb_Car_Status cs where cs.Vin=cl.Vin) <> 6) --6表示状态为“出库处理” ,0.00) ) --车辆库存金额 ,CarILCount=( SELECT count(1) FROM tb_Car_List cl where cl.DraftNo in (SELECT DraftNo FROM tb_Draft_List dl where dl.DealerID=T.DealerID and dl.BankID=T.BankID) and cl.BrandID=T.BrandID and (SELECT cs.StatusType FROM tb_Car_Status cs where cs.Vin=cl.Vin) = 3 --3表示状态为“在库” ) --在库车辆台数（状态为“在库”） ,CarILMoney=( ISNULL( (SELECT SUM(CONVERT(MONEY,cl.CarCost)) FROM tb_Car_List cl where cl.DraftNo in (SELECT DraftNo FROM tb_Draft_List dl where dl.DealerID=T.DealerID and dl.BankID=T.BankID) and cl.BrandID=T.BrandID and (SELECT cs.StatusType FROM tb_Car_Status cs where cs.Vin=cl.Vin) = 3) --3表示状态为“在库” ,0.00) ) --在库车辆金额（状态为“在库”） ,CarITCount=( SELECT count(1) FROM tb_Car_List cl where cl.DraftNo in (SELECT DraftNo FROM tb_Draft_List dl where dl.DealerID=T.DealerID and dl.BankID=T.BankID) and cl.BrandID=T.BrandID and (SELECT cs.StatusType FROM tb_Car_Status cs where cs.Vin=cl.Vin) = 1 --1表示状态为“在途” ) --在途车辆数量（状态为“在途”） ,CarITMoney=( ISNULL( (SELECT SUM(CONVERT(MONEY,cl.CarCost)) FROM tb_Car_List cl where cl.DraftNo in (SELECT DraftNo FROM tb_Draft_List dl where dl.DealerID=T.DealerID and dl.BankID=T.BankID) and cl.BrandID=T.BrandID and (SELECT cs.StatusType FROM tb_Car_Status cs where cs.Vin=cl.Vin) = 1) --1表示状态为“在途” ,0.00) ) --在途车辆金额（状态为“在途”） ,CarMoveCount=( SELECT count(1) FROM tb_Car_List cl where cl.DraftNo in (SELECT DraftNo FROM tb_Draft_List dl where dl.DealerID=T.DealerID and dl.BankID=T.BankID) and cl.BrandID=T.BrandID and (SELECT cs.StatusType FROM tb_Car_Status cs where cs.Vin=cl.Vin) = 4 --4表示状态为“移动处理” ) --移动车辆数量（状态为“移动”） ,CarMoveMoney=( ISNULL( (SELECT SUM(CONVERT(MONEY,cl.CarCost)) FROM tb_Car_List cl where cl.DraftNo in (SELECT DraftNo FROM tb_Draft_List dl where dl.DealerID=T.DealerID and dl.BankID=T.BankID) and cl.BrandID=T.BrandID and (SELECT cs.StatusType FROM tb_Car_Status cs where cs.Vin=cl.Vin) = 4) --4表示状态为“移动处理” ,0.00) ) --移动车辆金额（状态为“移动”） FROM tb_Dealer_Bank_List T {Where} ) TT WHERE row BETWEEN {Start} AND {End}

SELECT T.BankID,T.BankName,T.DealerID,T.DealerName,T.BrandID,T.BrandName ,CarAllCount=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {TableName}(NOLOCK) Where Statu <> 0) ,CarAllMoney=(SELECT ISNULL(SUM(CONVERT(MONey,CarCost)),0.0000) FROM {TableName}(NOLOCK) Where Statu <> 0) ,CarILCount=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {TableName}(NOLOCK) Where Statu = 1) ,CarILMoney=(SELECT ISNULL(SUM(CONVERT(MONey,CarCost)),0.0000) FROM {TableName}(NOLOCK) Where Statu = 1) ,CarITCount=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {TableName}(NOLOCK) Where Statu = 3) ,CarITMoney=(SELECT ISNULL(SUM(CONVERT(MONey,CarCost)),0.0000) FROM {TableName}(NOLOCK) Where Statu = 3) ,CarMoveCount=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {TableName}(NOLOCK) Where Statu = 2) ,CarMoveMoney=(SELECT ISNULL(SUM(CONVERT(MONey,CarCost)),0.0000) FROM {TableName}(NOLOCK) Where Statu = 2) FROM {TableName} T {Where} GROUP BY BankID,BankName,DealerID,DealerName,BrandID,BrandName

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY d.DraftNo asc) row, d.PledgeNo, GuaranteeNo, d.DraftNo, CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),d.BeginTime,111) BeginTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),d.EndTime,111) EndTime, d.DarftMoney, CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),QualifiedNoDate,111) QualifiedNoDate, CarModel, CarClass, Displacement, CarColor, EngineNo, Vin, car.QualifiedNo, KeyNumber, CarCost, CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),car.CreateTime,111) CreateTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),TransitTime,111) TransitTime, Statu, OutTime, MoveTime, car.Remarks FROM {TableName}(NOLOCK) car LEFT JOIN tb_Draft_List d ON car.DraftNo=d.DraftNo {Where} ) T Where T.row BETWEEN {Start} AND {End}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(order by T.DealerID) row ,D.Address,T.DealerID,T.DealerName,T.BankID,T.BankName,T.BrandID,B.BrandName, szyd= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther = '私自移动' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID ), szsm= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther = '私自售卖' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID ), xswhk= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther = '销售未还款' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID ) FROM tb_StockError_List T INNER JOIN tb_Dealer_List D ON T.DealerID=D.DealerID LEFT JOIN tb_Brand_List B ON T.BrandID=B.BrandID WHERE {Where} GROUP BY T.BankID,T.BankName,T.DealerID,T.DealerName,D.Address,T.BrandID,B.BrandName ) TT WHERE TT.row BETWEEN {Start} AND {End} ORDER BY TT.row

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(order by ID) row,ID,D.Address,T.DealerID,T.DealerName,T.BankID,T.BankName,T.BrandID,B.BrandName, szyd= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther = '私自移动' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID ), szsm= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther = '私自售卖' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID ), xswhk= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther = '销售未还款' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID ) FROM tb_StockError_List T INNER JOIN tb_Dealer_List D ON T.DealerID=D.DealerID LEFT JOIN tb_Brand_List B ON T.BrandID=B.BrandID
GROUP BY T.ID,T.BankID,T.BankName,T.DealerID,T.DealerName,D.Address,T.BrandID,B.BrandName ) TT

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(order by ID) row,ID,BankID,BankName,DealerID,DealerName, szyd= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther like '%移动%' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID ), szsm= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther like '%售卖%' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID ), xswhk= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther like '%未还款%' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID ) FROM tb_StockError_List T WHERE {Where} GROUP BY ID,BankID,BankName,DealerID,DealerName

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() Over(Order by temp.BankID) No,* FROM ( SELECT distinct T.BankID,T.BankName,T.DealerID,T.DealerName,isnull(dbl.BrandID,0) BrandID,isnull(dbl.BrandName,'') BrandName, szydcount= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther = '私自移动' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID AND BrandID=T.BrandID ), szsmcount= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther = '私自售卖' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID AND BrandID=T.BrandID ), xswhkcount= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther = '销售未还款' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID AND BrandID=T.BrandID ), zsclcount= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther = '质损车辆' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID AND BrandID=T.BrandID ), zyczsjccount= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther = '质押车做试驾车' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID AND BrandID=T.BrandID ), zyclbcount= ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_StockError_List WHERE ErrorOther = '质押车零部件被拆卸' AND BankID=T.BankID AND DealerID=T.DealerID AND BrandID=T.BrandID ) FROM tb_StockError_List T left join tb_Dealer_Bank_List dbl on T.BankID=dbl.BankID and T.DealerID=dbl.DealerID ) temp {Where}
SELECT d.SupervisorName,s.LinkPhone FROM tb_Dealer_List(NOLOCK) d INNER JOIN tb_Supervisor_List(NOLOCK) s ON d.SupervisorID=s.SupervisorID {Where}
